name: The Ultimate Deception
tooltip:
The Ultimate DeceptionLevel 60

Bring a Skin of Shadow, 3 Frayed Abomination Stitchings and 1 Twilight Cultist Robe to Aurel Goldleaf at Cenarion Hold in Silithus.  You must also bring Logistics Task Briefing XI in order to complete this quest.

Requirements:
- Skin of Shadow
- Frayed Abomination Stitching x 3
- Twilight Cultist Robe
